attributes.action: Demand St Martin-in-the-Fields reverse decision to cast out loyal musicians
attributes.additional_details: We call on Parliamentarians of all faiths and none to support our call for St Martin-in-the-Fields to immediately stop, reflect and reverse a decision which will cause severe hardship for hundreds of musicians in numerous orchestras and choirs who have served and supported St Martin-in-the-Fields faithfully for three decades. This abrupt and dismissive action is callous and un-Christian. It will reduce the viability of hundreds of musicians’ freelance work and put many orchestras out of business
attributes.background: For 30 years our orchestras and choirs have brought joy to thousands of people and raised millions of pounds to support the work of St Martin-in-the-Fields and the homeless. Now in the midst of a global pandemic with no consultation we have been informed by email that concerts will be in-house only

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
